mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(book_id), 0) + 1 AS book_id FROM book_list
SELECT * FROM book_list ORDER BY book_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_list (book_id, book_name, book_price, book_des, book_img, book_pages, book_isbn, book_writer, book_regdate, category_code) VALUES(#{bookId}, #{bookName}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookDes}, #{bookImg}, #{bookPages}, "N", #{bookWriter}, #{bookRegdate}, #{categoryCode})
